function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Suspension of essential and public services","Impact":"Limiting access to essential services","Mitigation":"Implement alternative service delivery methods","Technologies":"Teleconferencing and remote service tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and service providers"},{"Description":"Inadequate cleaning and sanitizing","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement regular and thorough cleaning protocols","Technologies":"High-quality cleaning and sanitizing equipment","People":"Occupants of the premises","Owner":"Facility managers and cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate isolation facilities","Impact":"Spread of disease within the premises","Mitigation":"Establish designated and well-equipped isolation rooms","Technologies":"Negative pressure systems and UV disinfection","People":"Suspected cases and healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"}]}
